properties.title: Installing Gallery Magick Image Processing CMS Plugins

section.name: Prerequisites
section.p: Note: Please make sure to install Prerequisites on the system.

section.name: Maven Repository for Gallery Magick Image Processing
section.p: Make sure you have the forge Maven2 repository reference in the root pom.xml of your project.

section.name: Installing Gallery Magick Image Processing CMS Plugins

subsection.name: Add Dependencies
subsection.p: Make sure you have dependency definition in the root pom.xml of your project.

div.source:
<dependencyManagement>
<!-- SNIP -->
<dependencies>
<!-- SNIP -->
<!-- NOTE: You should set a property named 'forge.gallery-magick.version' to a version of this plugin! -->
<!-- gallery-magick-bootstrap module registers a new Gallery Processor with ID, "service.magick.command.gallery.processor", in Repository. --> <dependency> <groupId>org.onehippo.forge.gallery-magick</groupId> <artifactId>gallery-magick-bootstrap</artifactId> <version>${forge.gallery-magick.version}</version> </dependency>
<!-- gallery-magick-cms contains CMS Plugin components. --> <dependency> <groupId>org.onehippo.forge.gallery-magick</groupId> <artifactId>gallery-magick-cms</artifactId> <version>${forge.gallery-magick.version}</version> </dependency>
<!-- SNIP -->
</dependencies>
<!-- SNIP -->
</dependencyManagement>

subsection.p: And add the following dependency reference into your CMS web application subproject.

gallery-magick-bootstrap module registers a new Gallery Processor with ID, service.magick.command.gallery.processor, in your Hippo Repository. It doesn't replace the default Gallery Processor (ID: service.gallery.processor). Because this bootstrap module doesn't change any Gallery Processor reference confgurations automatically, it would not make any changes on your system yet. To replace all the Gallery Processor reference configurations in your system, you should include more property setting bootstrap initialize items in your project (typically in bootstrap/configuration/src/main/resources/hippoecm-extension.xml) as explained in the next section.

section.name: Bootstrapping to Replace the Default Gallery Processor
section.p: There are several Gallery Processor reference configurations in the repository. Here is the list:
All of those listed above are pointing to JCR properties which are set to the default Gallery Processor ID, service.gallery.processor.
Now, in order to use the Magick Command Gallery Processor instead of the default Gallery Processor component, we need to replace those property values by service.magick.command.gallery.processor.

To replace all of those Gallery Processor reference configurations, you can use Single Property Setting Bootstrap Initialization technique in your project. (Reference: Repository Initialization Instructions. See the Set a Single Property section. )
These initialization items should be typically added in bootstrap/configuration/src/main/resources/hippoecm-extension.xml in your project.

div.source:

<sv:node sv:name="gallery-magick-demo-configuration-workflows-gallery-image-gallery-renderer-gallery-processor-id"> <sv:property sv:name="jcr:primaryType" sv:type="Name"> <sv:value>hippo:initializeitem</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:sequence" sv:type="Double"> <sv:value>32000.1</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:contentroot" sv:type="String"> <sv:value>/hippo:configuration/hippo:workflows/gallery/image-gallery/frontend:renderer/gallery.processor.id</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:contentpropset" sv:type="String"> <sv:value>service.magick.command.gallery.processor</sv:value> </sv:property> </sv:node>
<sv:node sv:name="gallery-magick-demo-namespaces-hippogallery-image-templates-default-upload-gallery-processor-id"> <sv:property sv:name="jcr:primaryType" sv:type="Name"> <sv:value>hippo:initializeitem</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:sequence" sv:type="Double"> <sv:value>32000.2</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:contentroot" sv:type="String"> <sv:value>/hippo:namespaces/hippogallery/image/editor:templates/_default_/upload/gallery.processor.id</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:contentpropset" sv:type="String"> <sv:value>service.magick.command.gallery.processor</sv:value> </sv:property> </sv:node>
<sv:node sv:name="gallery-magick-demo-namespaces-hippogallery-image-templates-default-crop-gallery-processor-id"> <sv:property sv:name="jcr:primaryType" sv:type="Name"> <sv:value>hippo:initializeitem</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:sequence" sv:type="Double"> <sv:value>32000.3</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:contentroot" sv:type="String"> <sv:value>/hippo:namespaces/hippogallery/image/editor:templates/_default_/crop/gallery.processor.id</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:contentpropset" sv:type="String"> <sv:value>service.magick.command.gallery.processor</sv:value> </sv:property> </sv:node>
<sv:node sv:name="gallery-magick-demo-namespaces-hippogallery-image-templates-default-regenerate-gallery-processor-id"> <sv:property sv:name="jcr:primaryType" sv:type="Name"> <sv:value>hippo:initializeitem</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:sequence" sv:type="Double"> <sv:value>32000.4</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:contentroot" sv:type="String"> <sv:value>/hippo:namespaces/hippogallery/image/editor:templates/_default_/regenerate/gallery.processor.id</sv:value> </sv:property> <sv:property sv:name="hippo:contentpropset" sv:type="String"> <sv:value>service.magick.command.gallery.processor</sv:value> </sv:property> </sv:node>

section.p: Now, you're ready to use the plugin!
